name: Garf's House
description:
Garf invited you to his house! It'd simply be rude not to come.

Garf's House is an unhinged choice-based (psychological?) horror visual novel game. It's my first game developed in Renpy over the course of 2 sleepless nights. unsettling visuals, a disturbing soundtrack, and emotional story lines there's lots of new sensations to experience at Garf's House.

There's 5 endings plus one secret ending, many unique ways to die, and approximately an hour worth of paths and content to explore.

I do not claim ownership of any images or materials used
